title: Fruit and Vegetables in Pots (gnv64)
description:
Simple Steps to Success: Fruit and Vegetables in Pots
By Jo Whittingham
DK Publishing | January 2012 | ISBN-10: 0756689805 | True PDF | 144 pages | 45.4 mb

Using a combination of easily accessible information and inspiring photographs, the Simple Steps series promotes gardening as a real pleasure rather than a back-breaking chore.
In Fruit and Vegetables in Pots, learn simple steps to growing and nurturing your own fruits and vegetables in containers.

About the Author
Jo Whittingham is an author and gardening journalist, specializing in fruit and vegetables. Her book titles include Vegetables in a Small Garden in the Simple Steps series, and she also writes a monthly column for The Scotsman newspaper.

CONTENTS
8 Edible inspirations
Plant containers with a range of beautiful crops to create decorative designs for your garden, patio, window box, or balcony.
20 Getting started
Choose fruit and vegetables to suit your taste, and select the right compost and containers to ensure they thrive.
32 How to sow and plant
Learn how to raise plants from seed and planting techniques and aftercare for a wide range of fruit and vegetables.
68 Recipe collections
Follow these easy planting recipes to create stunning combinations of herbs, fruit, and vegetables in ornamental pots.
92 Caring for your crops
Discover how to keep your plants in peak condition throughout the year, and easy ways to deter pests and prevent diseases.
110 Plant guide
Use this simple guide to some of the best fruit and vegetable varieties to plan your productive pots for all seasons.
140 Index
143 Suppliers
144 Acknowledgements
